indexPage.drawOnYourPhoneSubtext: With your finger or with a stylus, following instructions... or your inspiration !
indexPage.shareYourDrawingSubtext: At anytime, when you're ready, by the click of a button.
indexPage.joinArtworkSubtext: Drawings from all users appear in realtime on a wide canvas.
indexPage.iterateSubtext: The artpiece keeps evolving all the time. You can draw as much as you want. Express yourself !
